specialRules.title: They Shall Know No Fear
description: Space Marines are renowned for their tenacity and bravery. This is represented by the following rules:
* It takes 2 Blast Markers to suppress a Space Marine unit or kill a unit in a broken formation (ignore any leftover Blast Markers).
* Space Marine formations are only broken if they have 2 Blast Markers per unit in the formation.

* Space Marines formations only count half their number of Blaster markers in assault resolution (rounding down to a minimum of one). Halve the number of extra hits suffered by a Space Marine formation that loses an assault, rounding down in favour of the Space Marines.
* When a broken Space Marine formation rallies, it receives a number of Blast Markers equal to the number of units, rather than half this number.

specialRules.title: Lance
description: When units with Reinforced Armour are hit by a weapon with the Lance ability they do not get to re-roll failed armour saves.

specialRules.title: Iron Hands Characters
description: Iron Hands characters may only be placed in units of INF unless otherwise specified.

specialRules.title: Heavy Armoured Vehicle (H-AV)
description: Units with the unit type H-AV can take two damage before they are killed, and counts as two units for Outnumber, Blast Markers, number of attacks in an assault, hit allocation and the maximum number of units in base contact. H-AV are treated as WE when hit by weapons that do multiple points of damage (e.g. TK(D3)) In addition it is possible to critically hit H-AVs. If a Critical Hit is rolled, the unit is destroyed with no further effects. H-AVs are treated like normal Armoured Vehicles in all other respects.

unit.name: Blood Claw Assaults
unit.notes: May use Drop Pods.

unit.name: Iron Hands Tacticals
unit.notes: Armed with a Missile Launcher. If the formation contains a Iron Hands Techmarine, the Missile Launcherswill be replaced by a Graviton Guns.

unit.name: Wolf Guard Terminators
unit.notes: May use Drop Pods.

unit.name: Wolf Guard Assault Terminators
unit.notes: May use Drop Pods.

unit.name: Deathwing Knights
weapons: Maces of Absolution and Storm Shields

unit.name: Assault Centurions
unit.notes: Counts as Terminators for being transported.

unit.name: Devastator Centurions
unit.notes: Counts as Terminators for being transported.

unit.name: Land Speeder Storm
unit.notes: May transport one unit of Scouts.

unit.name: Dreadnought, Hellfire
unit.notes: Counts as a Dreadnought for the purposes of being transported.

unit.name: Dreadnought, Ironclad
unit.notes: Counts as a Dreadnought for the purposes of being transported.

unit.name: Dreadnought, Siege
unit.notes: Counts as a Dreadnought for the purposes of being transported.

unit.name: Dreadnought, Venerable
unit.notes: Counts as a Dreadnought for the purposes of being transported.

unit.name: Razorback
unit.notes: May transport one infantry unit (except Terminators) without Jump Packs or Mounted. Armed with either Twin Lascannon or Twin Heavy Bolter. Razorbacks armed with Twin Heavy Bolter have their firefight value increased to 4+.

unit.name: Blood Angels Razorback
unit.notes: May transport one infantry unit (except Terminators) without Jump Packs or Mounted. Armed with either Twin Lascannon or Twin Heavy Bolter. Razorbacks armed with Twin Heavy Bolter have their firefight value increased to 4+.

unit.name: Deathwatch Razorback
unit.notes: May transport one infantry unit (except a Terminator unit) without Jump Packs or Mounted.

unit.name: Vortimer Razorback
unit.notes: May transport one infantry unit (except a Terminator unit) without Jump Packs or Mounted.

unit.name: Rhino
unit.notes: May transport two infantry units (except Terminators) without Jump Packs or Mounted.

unit.name: Siege Rhino
unit.notes: May transport two infantry units (except Terminators) without Jump Packs or Mounted.

unit.name: Damocles Command Rhino
unit.notes: May transport two infantry units (except Terminators) without Jump Packs or Mounted.

unit.name: Blood Angels Rhino
unit.notes: May transport two infantry units (except Terminators) without Jump Packs or Mounted.

unit.name: Death Company Rhino
unit.notes: May transport two infantry units (except Terminators) without Jump Packs or Mounted.

unit.name: Grey Knights Rhino
unit.notes: May transport two infantry units (except Terminators) without Jump Packs or Mounted.

unit.name: Land Raider
unit.notes: May transport one Terminator unit or two infantry units without Jump Packs or Mounted.

unit.name: Land Raider Redeemer
unit.notes: May transport three infantry units without Jump Packs or Mounted; Terminators count as one and a half units each, rounding up. Counts as a Land Raider for the purposes of being transported.

unit.name: Deathwing Land Raider
unit.notes: May transport one Terminator unit or two infantry units without Jump Packs or Mounted.

unit.name: Vortimer Land Raider
unit.notes: May transport one Terminator unit or two infantry units without Jump Packs or Mounted.

unit.name: Vortimer Land Raider Redeemer
unit.notes: May transport three infantry units without Jump Packs or Mounted; Terminators count as one and a half units each, rounding up. Counts as a Land Raider for the purposes of being transported.

unit.name: Land Raider Achilles
unit.notes: May transport one infantry unit (except a Terminator unit) without Jump Packs or Mounted. Counts as a Land Raider for the purposes of being transported.

unit.name: Land Raider Anvilarum
unit.notes: May transport one Dreadnought or two infantry units without Jump Packs or Mounted. Counts as a Land Raider for the purposes of being transported.

unit.name: Land Raider Crusader
unit.notes: May transport three infantry units without Jump Packs or Mounted. Terminators count as one and a half units each, rounding up. Counts as a Land Raider for the purposes of being transported.

unit.name: Deathwatch Land Raider
unit.notes: May transport three infantry units without Jump Packs or Mounted. Terminators count as one and a half units each, rounding up. Counts as a Land Raider for the purposes of being transported.

unit.name: Land Raider Helios
unit.notes: Armed with either a Hyperios or Whirlwind Launcher. May transport one infantry unit (except a Terminator unit) without Jump Packs or Mounted. Counts as a Land Raider for the purposes of being transported.

unit.name: Land Raider Prometheus
unit.notes: May transport one Terminator unit or two infantry units without Jump Packs or Mounted.

unit.name: Land Raider Wrath of Mjalnar
unit.notes: May transport one Terminator unit or two infantry units without Jump Packs or Mounted.

unit.name: Fellblade
unit.crit: The Fellblade is destroyed. All units within 5cm suffer a hit on a 5+.

unit.name: Glaive
unit.crit: The Glaive is destroyed. All units within 5cm suffer a hit on a 5+.

unit.name: Deathwatch Landing Craft
unit.notes: May transport twelve infantry units, Attack Bikes or Dreadnoughts; Terminators and Dreadnoughts count as two units each; plus any six armoured vehicle units (except Dreadnoughts); Land Raiders count as one and a half units each, rounding up.
unit.crit: The unit and all units being carried are destroyed. All units within 5cm suffer a hit.

unit.name: Grey Knights Landing Craft
unit.notes: May transport twelve infantry units or Dreadnoughts; Terminators and Dreadnoughts count as two units each; plus any six armoured vehicle units (except Dreadnoughts); Land Raiders count as one and a half units each, rounding up. Critical Hit Effect: The unit and all units being carried are destroyed. All units within 5cm suffer a hit on 4+.

unit.name: Stormwolf Assault Boat
unit.notes: May transport four infantry units without Mounted; Terminators and Dreadnoughts count as two units each. Counts as a Landing Craft for being transported.
unit.crit: The Stormwolf and all units being carried are destroyed.

unit.name: Storm Raven
unit.notes: May transport two infantry units without Mounted; Terminators counts as two units each. May in addition transport one Dreadnought. Counts as a Landing Craft for being transported.

unit.name: Corvus Blackstar Dropship
unit.notes: May transport three infantry units or Attack Bikes. Terminators count as one and a half units each, rounding up. May in addition transport one Dreadnought or Land Speeder.

unit.name: Storm Eagle
unit.notes: May transport four infantry units without Mounted; Terminators and Dreadnoughts count as two units each.
unit.crit: The Storm Eagle and all units being carried are destroyed.

unit.name: Darkwing Storm Eagle
unit.notes: May transport four infantry units without Mounted; Terminators and Dreadnoughts count as two units each.
unit.crit: The Storm Eagle and all units being carried are destroyed.

unit.name: Thunderhawk
unit.notes: May transport eight infantry units, Attack Bikes; Terminators and Dreadnoughts count as two units each.
unit.crit: The Thunderhawk and all units being carried are destroyed.

unit.name: Thunderhawk Transporter
unit.notes: May carry up to two of the following units: Stalkers, Hunters, Predators, Razorbacks, Rhinos and Vindicators. Land Raiders counts as two units each. In addition it may also carry any infantry transported in these vehicles.
unit.crit: The Thunderhawk Transporter and all units being carried are destroyed.

unit.name: Iron Hands Thunderhawk Transporter
unit.notes: May carry up to two of the following units: Dreadnoughts, Hunters, Predators, Razorbacks, Rhinos, Stalkers and Vindicators. Land Raiders counts as two units each. In addition it may also carry any infantry transported in these vehicles.
unit.crit: The Thunderhawk Transporter and all units being carried are destroyed.

unit.name: Deathwatch Thunderhawk Transporter
unit.notes: May carry up to two of the following units: Stalkers, Hunters, Predators, Razorbacks, Rhinos and Vindicators. Land Raiders counts as two units each. In addition it may also carry any infantry transported in these vehicles.
unit.crit: The Thunderhawk Transporter and all units being carried are destroyed.

unit.name: Grey Knights Thunderhawk Transporter
unit.notes: May carry up to two of the following units: Stalkers, Hunters, Predators, Razorbacks, Rhinos and Vindicators. Land Raiders counts as two units each. In addition it may also carry any infantry transported in these vehicles.
unit.crit: The Thunderhawk Transporter and all units being carried are destroyed.

unit.name: Landing Craft
unit.notes: May transport twelve infantry units, Attack Bikes or Dreadnoughts; Terminators and Dreadnoughts count as two units each; plus any six armoured vehicle units (except H-AV, Dreadnoughts); Land Raiders count as one and a half units each, rounding up.
unit.crit: The Landing Craft and all units being carried are destroyed. All units within 5cm suffer a hit.

unit.name: Hunter Class Destroyer
unit.notes: May transport four infantry units. These may only deploy on to the battlefield using Teleport.

unit.name: Dark Hunter Class Destroyer
unit.notes: May transport four infantry units. These may only deploy on to the battlefield using Teleport. May in addition transport five Corvus Blackstars and three Thunderhawk Transporters along with any units these transport.

unit.name: Vanguard Class Light Cruiser
unit.notes: May transport ten infantry units, Attack Bikes, or Dreadnoughts; plus five light vehicles or armoured vehicle units (except Attack Bikes and Dreadnoughts); plus three Thunderhawks/Storm Eagles/Storm Wolfs and enough Drop Pods or Landing Craft to transport any other units being carried.

unit.name: Strike Cruiser
unit.notes: May transport twenty infantry units, Attack Bikes, or Dreadnoughts; plus twenty light vehicles or armoured vehicle units (except Attack Bikes and Dreadnoughts); plus six Thunderhawks/Storm Eagles/Storm Wolfs and enough Drop Pods or Landing Craft to transport any other units being carried.

unit.name: Grey Knights Strike Cruiser
unit.notes: May transport twenty infantry units, Attack Bikes, Dreadnoughts; plus ten light vehicles or armoured vehicle units (except Attack Bikes and Dreadnoughts) ; plus six Thunderhawks/Storm Eagles and enough Drop Pods or Landing Craft to transport any other units being carried.

unit.name: Battle Barge
specialRules: Slow to Arrive (May only arrive from turn 2 onwards)
unit.notes: May transport forty infantry units, Attack Bikes, or Dreadnoughts; plus thirty armoured vehicle units (except H-AV, Dreadnoughts); plus nine Thunderhawks/Storm Eagles/Storm Wolfs and enough Drop Pods or Landing Craft to transport any other units being carried.

unit.name: Drop Pod
unit.notes: May transport one formation of only the following units: Tacticals, Devastators, Dreadnought, Sternguard Veterans, Blood Claw Assaults, Wolf Guard Terminators, Grey Knights Strike Squad, Grey Knights Purgation Squad. After the Drop Pod lands, its Deathwind attacks all enemy units within 15cm. Each enemy formation attacked receives a Blast Marker for coming under fire, and an extra Blast Marker for each casualty. Then any troops carried in the Drop Pod must disembark within 5cm of the Drop Pod or within 5cm of another unit from the same formation that has already landed, so long as all units are placed within 15cm of the Drop Pod. Drop pod models should be removed from the board once the formation they transport has disembarked.
